title: What’s Going on With PlayStation Mobile? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.03.23
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and get up to 50% off single pairs of sunglasses.

Greg and Tim talk about PlayStation Mobile's recent departures, Psychonauts 3 is not happening anytime soon, and Greg does something you wouldn't expect during housekeeping.

00:04:09 - Housekeeping
 - Indiana Jones and The Dial of Destiny in review is up right now! Youtube.com/KindaFunny
 - Tomorrow is American Independence Day so we’re taking the day off! No KFGD or stream until we’re back on Wednesday.
 - Closing tiiime (please sing the semisonic song)! This is truly the last call for our merch on the RT store, so BOGO (buy one get one free) with code BONGOS through the end of the week!
    -   The Roper Report   -

00:56:29 - Ark: Survival Evolved Remaster has been Delayed to October
